display_name: MAP Index 4: Narcolepsy Like Symptoms Score
calculation: map Narcolepsy Like Symptom Index = Mean of map_1000, map_1100.  If a variable is = -55 or null, then don't include it in the caluclation and decrease the denominoator by 1.  If all values are -55 or null, then score is unavailable and can be coded -55
